summary: Branding text and PWA metadata were updated to “Reporther”, and the service worker cache names/precache URLs were changed to Reporther-specific values. Icon references were switched to new Reporther filenames, but no new icon image assets were added in the diff, and several unrelated product-feature changes are described in the modified file summary (suggesting scope beyond branding).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/replace the actual icon image files (favicon + PWA icons) with the new “man behind bars” assets under frontend/public/assets/generated so the referenced Reporther icon filenames exist.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff updates references to /assets/generated/reporther-*.png, but the diff shows “Added: 0” and no image assets were added or modified, so the newly referenced icon files are not evidenced as present.

hallucinated_features.description: New backend/query features for persisting and retrieving the user’s selected police department (useGetSelectedDepartment/useSaveSelectedDepartment/useClearSelectedDepartment).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits changes to branding/icon/identity; this appears to be additional product functionality unrelated to branding.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts" describes new police department persistence hooks)

hallucinated_features.description: UI/feature changes such as a consolidated “Report!” dropdown with 4 tabs and removal of a “Zero Tolerance video feature.”
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; appears to be new/changed product behavior beyond branding/icon/identity.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx" describes consolidated "Report!" dropdown and video feature removal)

hallucinated_features.description: Incident/evidence workflow changes (evidence upload calling backend mutation with real incident IDs and cache invalidation) and incident history/detail/message generator functional enhancements (e.g., red chat-log mode persisted in localStorage, tone intensity selector, SMS/share/copy updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and conflicts with the non-goal of not adding product features beyond branding/icon/identity changes.
